column5: First kick at tackling Grand River Catfish. Timing is everything and with the past weeks temps I figured it would be a little on the tough side but the sunshine and a little guess work the four of us managed our first Erie Cats and personal bests. Always good to see fish.  We'll be back in two weeks and plan on making good on surpassing those numbers. Would like to thank FisherPete for sharing his knowledge with us.    Heres a short clip ;   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HuaKb5GvvvY
Good to see you guys got into a few. I love it out there. So much fun
Some cool looking Cats there boys loved the video and a great tune to go along with it thanks.  Cheers Mitch...
Nice fish guys....Good luck with your next trip.
We knew the GoPro was with us but never realized all that footage had been captured. Some sneaky camers work.
Nice.  I dont see any current there. What the hell are those other fellas talking about? LOL
If you're planning on the 9th, PM me. HTHM is guiding in his own backyard
That must be a big yard HTHM has.
